content: The impact, so when you have close to a $20 million impact from Omicron headwinds related to cruise cancellations, quarantines on our staff services canceled, ships taken out of service, load factors going down to almost as low as when the cruise industry got back into service in June, July of last year, all of that impacted top line substantially and as well EBITDA probably close to the number we almost reported as positive EBITDA -- adjusted EBITDA.
